citations.narrative:
Pronto Freight Ways Inc. is transporting regulated animals without a valid registration. Pronto Freight Ways Inc. is not
registered with the USDA, a requirement for transport of USDA regulated animals in commerce.
Pronto Freight Ways Inc. needs to complete the application as USDA class H, Intermediate Handler and submit it to the
address below.
USDA-APHIS-AC
2150 Centre Ave
Building B 3W11
Ft Collins, Colorado 80526
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the airline representative.
Additional Inspectors:
CHAD MOORE, ANIMAL CARE INSPECTOR
JESSICA WATSON, Supervisory Animal Care SpecialistEnd Section

narrative:
2.25(a) 
   
Requirements and procedures. 
Pronto Freight Ways Inc. is transporting regulated animals without a valid registration. Pronto Freight Ways Inc. is not 
registered with the USDA, a requirement for transport of USDA regulated animals in commerce. 
Pronto Freight Ways Inc. needs to complete the application as USDA class H, Intermediate Handler and submit it to the 
address below. 
 
USDA-APHIS-AC 
2150 Centre Ave 
Building B 3W11 
Ft Collins, Colorado 80526 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the airline representative.
